descriptionHtml:
Description : 
-------------------
Replace Lydia, Iona and Jordis the Sword-Maiden with a much better looking one !!
Replace the standard armor with the nightingale armor player 01 version.
Replace the long bow with a Deadric bow and arrow.

Version 0.1 : Add to inventory :
-------------------------------------------

Healing spell
Nightingale blade
Gold 2500
Default outfit nightingale
Scale 0.99
Health 200
Essential ON
Change the default outfit to normal chlotes 
Add the nightingale armor without hood to the inventory .
 ...so you can dress her as you wish.... 

HousecarlWindhelm Calder_Girl -----------HousecarlMarkarth Argis the Bulwark _Girl :
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Optional file :

Replace HousecarlWindhelm Calder with a Sexy Girl
Replace HousecarlMarkarth Argis the Bulwark with a sexy Girl


My other mod: A Sexy Iona Replacer v_01 by Laurkami - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11202

My other mod : A sexy Jordis the Sword-Maiden v 01 by Laurkami - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11319

Installation :
-----------------

The Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) is recommended for properly installing the mod. If you use NMM, just download and install!

Uninstalling :
------------------

Delete all the files you installed/use NMM to uninstall them. Or manually delete Housecarl.esp from your Skyrim\\Data folder.

Conflicts : 
---------------

May conflict with any other mods that change Lydia,Iona and Jordis the Sword-Maiden !!!!

My other mod: A Sexy Iona Replacer v_01 by Laurkami - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11202

My other mod : A sexy Jordis the Sword-Maiden v 01 by Laurkami - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11319
